description: The is a vocabulary learning task with several questions.

GapFillingQuestion.content: The aquarium needed cleaning because it was covered with green $BLANK.
He admitted $BLANK that he had forgotten the appointment.
The fly's attempts to escape the tightly sealed jar were $BLANK.
The scientist discovered a $BLANK in the experimental results.
He was asked to $BLANK with the marketing team to ensure a smooth launch of the new product.
To ensure the plants grow well, regular $BLANK of the soil is necessary.
The annual community $BLANK was held in the park, attracting many families and visitors.
He was delighted to attend a $BLANK of his old college friends.
He discussed his views on the project $BLANK during the interview.
The scientist noticed a $BLANK between the experiment results and the theoretical predictions.
Proper $BLANK of the garden soil is essential for healthy plant growth.
After hours of trying to start the old car, he realized that his attempts were $BLANK.
As part of the new project, she will $BLANK with the marketing department.
In many aquatic ecosystems, $BLANK serve as a primary source of food for various organisms.

ListeningQuestion.solution: Proper aeration of the garden soil ensures that plants receive enough oxygen to grow well.
Trying to fix the broken watch without the right tools was futile.
During the summer, the lake's surface often turns green due to algae growth.
Frankly, I must say your presentation was impressive and exceeded expectations.
She will liaise with the team tomorrow to finalize the event details.
The teacher noticed a discrepancy between the students' grades and the final report card.
We are planning a gathering to celebrate the end of the school year.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: Imagine you are in a meeting discussing a new project proposal. You have some serious reservations about the project and decide to speak up. How would you express your honest opinion?
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: Frankly, I don't think this project will be successful because we haven't done enough market research.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: Imagine you are working on a team project at your company. You are responsible for keeping in touch with another department to ensure everything is on track. How would you describe this task using the word 'liaise'?
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: I need to liaise with the marketing department to make sure they are updated on the project's progress and their inputs are incorporated.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You are planning an event for your friends and family to celebrate a special occasion. Describe how you would refer to this event.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: We are hosting a gathering for our family and friends to celebrate my birthday.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: Consider that you are taking care of a garden and you want to ensure that your plants grow healthy with well-developed roots. Explain the role of introducing air into the soil to achieve this.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: Aeration of the soil helps improve drainage and provides oxygen, which is essential for healthy root growth.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: Consider a situation where someone tries to fix a broken gadget without any knowledge about electronics. Describe their efforts.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: It was futile for him to attempt repairing the phone without the proper tools or expertise.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You have just reviewed two different attendance sheets from the same event, and they do not match. Explain the issue to your manager.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: There is a discrepancy between the two attendance sheets, as one lists 50 attendees while the other shows 55.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You are visiting a botanical garden with a large pond. Describe what you notice growing on the surface of the water.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: The pond was covered with green algae, giving the water a vibrant hue under the sunlight.
